release_notes: GitHub-based update system and license management

versions.release_notes: GitHub-based update system and license management
changelog: NEW: Update system now uses GitHub releases API
NEW: LemonSqueezy license system with user-based binding
NEW: Developer panel with build and release tools
NEW: What's New dialog to view version history
IMPROVED: License bound to Light Blue user account
IMPROVED: Shared release infrastructure with SideKick_PS
NEW: Light Blue integration for contact management
NEW: Quick Response system for client communications
NEW: Download management for client galleries
NEW: Settings GUI with dark theme
